name: Youdao OAuth Helper
description: Adds OAuth start/callback endpoints to exchange Youdao authorization code for access token.

basePath.description: Base path for OAuth routes. Endpoints become <basePath>/start and <basePath>/callback.

redirectUri.description: Exact callback URL configured in Youdao OpenAPI app settings.

strictState.description: Require callback state verification against prior /start requests. Default true.
